job title: Data analyst (SMB Revenue - Adoption Tracking Analyst, Local only)
job description:
Project Overview:

Our Marketing Solutions (Client) Sales Analytics and Solutions team is responsible for developing and maintaining systems that enable sales to drive customer success for our client's small and medium business advertisers.

Overall Responsibilities:
This role will support and communicate with Sales regarding system issues. This function provides initial response to the user and then investigate the issue. Tickets in low to medium complexity can be resolved at this tier based on troubleshooting documents and initial analysis, while more complex tickets will have to be escalated to Tier2. In addition, this tier will document known issues, run operational reports, manage the queue, prioritization, bucketing of tickets, analyzing dismissal reasons, and monitoring the systems proactively, communicating with users/reps.

Top 3 daily responsibilities:
  • Answering support ticket requests and communicate with internal customers daily
  • Investigate root-cause of issues and find resolution through data analysis
  • Triage and escalate system issues to engineering teams
Required Skills:
  • BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or engineering/math related
  • Strong analytical and communication skills
  • Experience in writing basic SQL queries
  • High attention to details and great organization skills
  • Experience in advanced data analysis using Excel or our client Sheets
Nice to Have Skills/Not Required:
  • Experience responding/resolving tickets or troubleshooting customer issues
  • Experience with CRM tools, sales / service applications
  • Knowledge of our client AdWords or other Digital Advertising tools
  • Ability to read code (Python/Javascript)
